step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders relatively still. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your body.
Your shoulders are moving a bit more here. Focus on keeping them stable and your elbows closer to your sides.
Excellent work on making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Keep your elbows steady.
You're doing well stretching your arms overhead. Try to keep your elbows from flaring out too much.
Good job relaxing and exhaling. Focus on keeping your elbows and wrists more stable as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your elbows steady and close to your body throughout the movement. Focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together when you push down.
